entry.value: SELECT * FROM items_updates WHERE timestamp <= '${timestamp}' and processed = 0
UPDATE items_updates set processed = 1, processed_timestamp = '${timestamp}' WHERE timestamp <= '${timestamp}' and processed = 0
SELECT count(id) as num_elements FROM items
